definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
to determine right and wrong based on public opinion (idiom)/Public opinion will judge what's right and wrong.
pinyin: shi4 fei1 zi4 you3 gong1 lun4

sentences.english: This is evident in the international community, its own conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 這在國際社會有目共睹，自有公論。
